C1 a state or an example of problems or trouble, often causing a delay or loss of comfort: We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the late arrival of the train. We had the inconvenience of being unable to use the kitchen for several weeks. Having to wait for ten minutes was a minor inconvenience. Synonyms
annoyance
bore (ANNOYING)
bother (ANNOYING) UK
irritant (MAKING ANGRY)
nuisance
a pain (in the neck) informal
